articles.title: 2025 IPO Market Largest Since 2021, Thanks To These Unicorns
articles.mainIdea: 2025 IPO Market Largest Since 2021, Thanks To These Unicorns
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: 2025 IPO Market Largest Since 2021, Thanks To These Unicorns. The year's 202 initial public offerings raised a combined $44 billion. IPO activity peaked during the summer, when Figma went public at 33 a share and closed the first day of trading at 115.50. It was a record first-day gain for a billion-dollar IPO. Related tickers mentioned: CRCL, FIG, KLAR, MDLN, STUB.

articles.title: Palantir, AppLovin Lead Five Stocks In Buy Zones As Market Revs Up
articles.mainIdea: Palantir, AppLovin Lead Five Stocks In Buy Zones As Market Revs Up
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Palantir, AppLovin Lead Five Stocks In Buy Zones As Market Revs Up. Palantir, Willdan Group, AppLovin, GE Aerospace and Garrett Motion are stocks to watch as they trade above buy points amid a recovering stock market. Palantir and Willdan have just broken out of traditional bases. AppLovin stock is between buy points while GE and Garrett are actionable from early entries. Related tickers mentioned: APP, GE, GTX, PLTR, WLDN, ^IXIC.
